page.title: 15A DAY IN THE LIFE OF ...
page.content: Thursday April 4th. I got up at 9 o clock and went into the bathroom and washed.I came back into my room dressed,then I went down -stairs for breakfast.I had cornflakes and a drink of tea. I went to the hairdresser's. My mum paid,it cost 65p. When I got in I watched the T.V. At 12 o'clock I had my dinner.I had chicken fingers and chips.After that I went out.I hadn't been out five minutes when it started raining.I put T.V. on and watched some cartoons. At 4.30 we had tea.We had spaghetti. At 5.45 we went swimming.I changed and jumped in.I swam about for a bit,and the girls went out.My dad and I got out, dried, and went home.I put my things in the wash and went to bed. It was 9.30p.m.
